title: Timing in IMSC
summary: When building an IMSC document, each defined piece of text must include timing information to specify when it should appear. There are multiple ways to describe when a subtitle should start and stop displaying, with pros and cons to each method. This article explains those different methods.

parents.title: IMSC: subtitles and captioning for the Web

pageTitle: Timing in IMSC - Web-related technologies | MDN
